postsMetadata.title: Bases en probabilités pour du Machine learning (In French)
postsMetadata.description: Mes notes sur les différents sujets de probabilités utils pour faire du Machine learning (Variables aléatoire,  Fonctions de distribution, Chaîne de Markov)

postsMetadata.title: Machine learning notes - Summary of Andrew's Ng course
postsMetadata.description: A non-exhaustive course on machine learning, with a summary of Andrew Ng's course. Provides a good overview of the different machine learning algorithms and their applications, all along with formulas and examples.

postsMetadata.title: Demonstration of normal equation formula for regression
postsMetadata.description: A detailed step-by-step demonstration of the normal equation formula for regression.
